channel.title: problem with Tor Browser in workstation
channel.description:
Hello all,
I have installed whonix on virtualbox. At the beginning, everything was Ok. But since 2 days, I have a problem with tor. Everything is OK in the gateway, update, synchronization and all, but when I run Tor on the workstation, it don't work. here is the message I have when I run a check:
code: 255 tor bootstrap timeout_type: none tot bootstrap_status: socket error: [errno 113] no route to host check_soks_port_open_test: 7 tor circuit: not established
On my host, Tor is running without any problem.
Can someone help me ?
Thanks in advance.
Tshorten

item.title: problem with Tor Browser in workstation
item.dc:creator: tshorten
item.description:
I have made some change in the definitions of the network.

It is working now !

Thanks for your help

Read full topic

item.source: problem with Tor Browser in workstation

item.title: problem with Tor Browser in workstation
item.dc:creator: tshorten
item.description:
hello Patrick,

thanks for your answer. Sorry for the Tor but for me tor and tor browser is the same.
Whonix complete successfully on the gateway. Everything is running fine on the gateway.
I run your command inside the Whonix-Workstation.
Here is the result:

Code 255
tor _bootstrap_timeout _type:none
tor_bootstrap_status:socket error: received empty socket content
check_socks_port_open_test:7
Tor circuit: not established

On the principal host, Tor browser is running without any problem.

Thanks

Tshorten

Read full topic
item.source: problem with Tor Browser in workstation

item.title: problem with Tor Browser in workstation
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Please don’t substitute writing Tor when you mean Tor Browser or the confusion will be perfect.

check -> whonixcheck

I don’t really know. We can only try to debug this.

whonixcheck does complete successfully on Whonix-Gateway?

Please run the following command inside Whonix-Workstation and post the output in this thread.

bash -x whonixcheck --function check_tor_bootstrap

Read full topic
item.source: problem with Tor Browser in workstation
